description: Search GitHub using the GitHub API.
name: github
optionsNumberDescription: The number of the PR or issue to search for.
repositoryDescription: Search for data on a specific GitHub repository.
repositoryIssuePRNotFound: {{ERROR}} I couldn't find an issue or PR with the number `{{number, number}}`.

userDescription: Search for a user on Github.
userNotFound: {{ERROR}} I could not find a Github user with the name `{{user}}`, try searching for a different one.
